medical_history.chief_complaint: Severe intrauterine growth retardation and postnatal failure to thrive.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient A exhibited mild intrauterine growth failure, followed by progressive postnatal growth retardation and severe failure to thrive. Patient B was born with severe intrauterine growth retardation, which continued as postnatal failure to thrive.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Previous episodes of severe failure to thrive and medical complications including hypothyroidism and renal failure in Patient A; Patient B had feeding issues requiring a gastrostoma at 10 months of age.
medical_history.family_history: Both mother (Patient A) and daughter (Patient B) with similar presentations of growth retardation, indicating a possible genetic component.
medical_history.social_history: Patient A worked as an administrative assistant; details on living conditions and lifestyle factors are not specified.
